instruction: Evaluate the following argument: "Having healthy snacks at work is a good motivation for employees."
output: Having healthy snacks at work can be a great way to motivate employees. Employees need to be able to stay focused and energized throughout the day, and having healthy snacks available in the workplace can help to provide that. Additionally, healthy snacks can help to improve morale and team bonding, as employees may get to know each other better as they enjoy their snacks together. Additionally, providing healthy snacks can show employees that the company cares about their wellbeing, which can further increase motivation.
